name: easyschool
description: EasySchool - SaaS School Management System with Microservices

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../school-service && npm install && cd ../student-service && npm install && cd ../teacher-service && npm install && cd ../parent-service && npm install && cd ../attendance-service && npm install && cd ../exam-service && npm install && cd ../fees-service && npm install && cd ../communication-service && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:school" "npm run dev:student" "npm run dev:teacher" "npm run dev:parent" "npm run dev:attendance" "npm run dev:exam" "npm run dev:fees" "npm run dev:communication"
